data.name: CryptoMoneya21
data.detailed_description:
Cryptomania is back with new coins!

Meet additional more complex levels and hype cryptocurrencies.

Still does not require an expensive video card for "mining".
data.about_the_game:
Cryptomania is back with new coins!

Meet additional more complex levels and hype cryptocurrencies.

Still does not require an expensive video card for "mining".
data.short_description: New coins and increased mining difficulty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7 8 8.1 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Core 4.2
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Core 4.2
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
